text: The W. H. Everhardt House, at 1223 College St. in Bowling Green, Kentucky, was built in 1879. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1979. It is Italianate in style. With ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Warren County, Kentucky Category:Italianate architecture in Kentucky Category:Houses completed in 1879
title: W.H. Everhardt House
